column1:
Question 1: Are you addicted to anything? For example coffee, cigarettes or your phone?
Listen: http://neonlanguages.com/okcorrect/int/question1.mp3

Question 2: Have you got a favourite film?
Listen: http://neonlanguages.com/okcorrect/int/question2.mp3

Question 3: Do you prefer summer or winter?
Listen: http://neonlanguages.com/okcorrect/int/question3.mp3

Question 4: When did you start learning English?
Listen: http://neonlanguages.com/okcorrect/int/question4.mp3

Question 5: How did your parents meet?
Listen: http://neonlanguages.com/okcorrect/int/question6.mp3

Question 6: What did you do last weekend?
Listen: http://neonlanguages.com/okcorrect/int/question5.mp3

Question 7: Which football team do you support?
Listen: http://neonlanguages.com/okcorrect/int/question7.mp3

Question 8: Have you ever eaten lobster?
Listen: http://neonlanguages.com/okcorrect/int/question8.mp3

Question 9: Do you speak any other languages?
Listen: http://neonlanguages.com/okcorrect/int/question9.mp3

Question 10: Do you prefer going to bed early or late?
Listen: http://neonlanguages.com/okcorrect/int/question10.mp3

Question 11: Have you been to France?
Listen: http://neonlanguages.com/okcorrect/int/question11.mp3

Question 12: Would you rather go for a ride in a speedboat or a helicopter?
Listen: http://neonlanguages.com/okcorrect/int/question12.mp3

Question 13. What's your oldest memory?
Listen: http://neonlanguages.com/okcorrect/int/question13.mp3

Question 14: Can you recommend me a good book?
Listen: http://neonlanguages.com/okcorrect/int/question14.mp3
